data.name: St Christopher's School Lockdown - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The soundtrack for the St Christopher's School Lockdown, by Markus Zierhofer, contains a selection of fifteen selected songs from the official score (two of which ended up on the cutting room floor due to design constraints, but we're including them anyway!).

Track List:
01 - MainTheme.mp3 2:06
02 - Kebab Journey.mp3 1:00
03 - The Charity Event.mp3 1:37
04 - The Seduction.mp3 1:48
05 - The Chase.mp3 1:49
06 - All We Have Tried.mp3 1:33
07 - First Cues.mp3 1:44
08 - Martin's Theme.mp3 1:53
09 - The Speech.mp3 1:29
10 - School Investigation.mp3 1:55
11 - Cyber Café.mp3 1:41
12 - The Toxic Runaway.mp3 1:19
13 - Voodoo Games.mp3 1:27
14 - No Lights.mp3 1:46
15 - That's All, Folks.mp3 3:21

Files will be downloaded to the following directory Steam\steamapps\common\The St Christopher's School Lockdown\St Christopher's School Lockdown Soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu/SteamOS 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz (Intel or AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
